abort.cannot_connect: Could not connect to the Rova API
abort.invalid_rova_area: Rova does not collect at this address

error.invalid_rova_area: Rova does not collect at this address

data.house_number_suffix: A suffix for your house number

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.description:
Configuring Rova using YAML is being removed but there was a connection error importing your YAML configuration.

Ensure connection to Rova works and restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the Rova YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to [set up the integration]({url}) manually.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.title: The Rova YAML configuration import failed

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_rov.description:
There was an error when trying to import your Rova YAML configuration.

Rova does not collect at this address.

Ensure the imported configuration is correct and remove the Rova YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to [set up the integration]({url}) manually.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_rov.title: The Rova YAML configuration import failed

no_rova_area.description:
Rova does not collect at {zip_code} anymore.

Please remove the integration.
no_rova_area.title: Rova does not collect at this address anymore
